title: Judge blocks suspension of Snap food aid during shutdown – US politics live
summary: A federal court ruling was issued just hours before potential cuts to food stamp benefits affecting over 40 million Americans. The decision may significantly impact low-income households reliant on these assistance programs. The ruling highlights ongoing legal battles surrounding food security initiatives in the U.S.

title: Trump administration blocked from suspending Snap benefits for millions of Americans
summary: A judge has granted a temporary restraining order, while another has mandated the government to maintain funding for a program supporting low-income households. This ruling ensures continued assistance for those in need. The decision highlights ongoing legal disputes over government support for vulnerable populations.

title: Mary Earps says she told Wiegman she was rewarding Hampton’s ‘bad behaviour’
summary: Mary Earps expressed her discontent to Lionesses head coach Sarina Wiegman about the decision to reinstate rival goalkeeper Hannah Hampton to the team. Earps believes that this move sends a message that "bad behaviour is being rewarded." Her protest highlights concerns about the team's selections and the implications for team culture.

title: M&S launches ‘secret support’ pants that offer men a ‘subtle lift’
summary: A retailer has launched innovative underwear designed to enhance male physique, akin to a push-up bra for women. This new product aims to boost men's confidence and self-esteem in their appearance. The initiative marks a growing trend in male undergarment development focused on enhancing comfort and support.

title: Palace’s statement on Andrew is ‘vindication’ for Virginia Giuffre, says her family
summary: Women’s rights groups have applauded a recent announcement, viewing it as a significant statement of support for survivors of abuse. They believe it highlights the importance of acknowledging and addressing issues of gender-based violence. The announcement is seen as a crucial step towards providing justice and empowerment for affected individuals.
